name: discharge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis.
